name: Dino-Score
description:
You play as Lambert, a giant super-hero(?) and buttkicking lizard attempting to save the Earth from a meteorite storm with his mighty baseball bat.

Ironically, in order to save the Earth he must destroy his beloved nations and their poor inhabitants.

CONTROLS:
WASD/Arrow Keys -> move
SPACEBAR -> jump
ESC -> pause

CREDITS:
Rachael Lampard-France
Alec Lauder
Cara Pearson
Rita Rosa
Andrea Serreli
